columns.Publication_ID: The unique identifier for each publication.
columns.Book_ID: The identifier linking the publication to a specific book.
columns.Publisher: The name of the organization publishing the book.
columns.Publication_Date: The date when the book was published.
columns.Price: The cost of the publication in the specified currency.

publication.table_description: The table records details about book publications.

columns.Book_ID: The unique identifier for each book.
columns.Title: The name of the book.
columns.Issues: The total number of issues published for the book.

book.table_description: The table stores information about books and their authors.
